Text:
just a heads up... this was a special. 

no new episode next week or week after.

new season is still TBA.

correction: Season 2 was split into two parts, not Season 3.

this is gonna create a confusing mess when the next season starts.

i guess i'll name them S04E**.REAL. (?) something like that

I would name them for what they really are and let those of us who care fix the files we already have. anyone who wants to keep things organized should grab a file renamer app and use it. (2 cents worth)
this would be season 3 ep 9 if you follow the web site listings
